code: import axios from'axios';import{responseInterceptor,errorInterceptor}from'./interceptors';import{Environment}from'../../../environment';export var Api=function Api(){var api=axios.create({baseURL:Environment.URL_BASE,headers:{authorization:"Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('APP_ACCESS_TOKEN')||'""'))}});api.interceptors.response.use(function(response){return responseInterceptor(response);},function(error){return errorInterceptor(error);});return api;};
